googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Jude Konerman
googleReviewsBySlug.json.text: If you need any plumbing needs, Vaugh’s Superior Plumbing is SUPERIOR. They are easy to communicate with, easy to work with, on time, professional, kind, and do great work! I will never consider any other company.
googleReviewsBySlug.json.responseFromOwnerText: Thank you very much for taking the time to give us a review Jude! It really means a lot to us, customer satisfaction is our number one priority! We are glad we could provide a superior plumbing service for you!
googleReviewsBySlug.json.title: Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC

googleReviewsBySlug.json.name: Ken Williams

Here is the detailed information about Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC in Alabama, based on the provided identifiers:

## Business Information:

- **Physical Location and Service Areas:** The business is located at 902 E 5th St, Bay Minette, AL 36526. However, specific service areas are not detailed in the available sources.
- **Hours and Payment Methods:** There is no information available on the business hours or payment methods for Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC.
- **Years in Operation:** Given the incorporation date of June 30, 2024, the business has been in operation for less than a year.

## Services & Specialties:
- **Types of Services Offered:** While the specific services offered by Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC are not detailed in the sources, it can be inferred that they provide typical plumbing services given the nature of the business.
- **Service Areas Covered:** As mentioned, the specific service areas are not detailed, but it is likely they serve the surrounding areas of Bay Minette, AL.
- **Emergency Service Availability:** There is no information available on whether they offer emergency services.
- **Prices or Rates:** No specific prices or rates are provided in the available sources.

- **Review Summaries with Specific Examples:** There are no detailed review summaries available for Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC in the provided sources. However, it is mentioned that the business has a 5-star rating based on 11 reviews, though the content of these reviews is not specified.
- **BBB Rating and Status:** There is no information available indicating that Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC is listed with the Better Business Bureau (BBB).
- **Common Customer Feedback Themes:** Without access to the specific reviews, common customer feedback themes cannot be determined.
- **Response to Reviews:** There is no information on how the business responds to reviews.

## Owner & Staff:

- **Staff Qualifications and Professional Certifications:** There is no information available regarding the qualifications or professional certifications of the staff at Vaughn’s Superior Plumbing LLC.

Given the recent incorporation of the business, detailed information may not be extensively available yet.
aboutUs: At Vaughn's Superior Plumbing LLC, we are a team of highly skilled and experienced plumbers dedicated to providing top-notch service to our local community. With our expertise in all aspects of plumbing, from installations to repairs and maintenance, we strive to deliver efficient and reliable solutions tailored to your specific needs. Our specialties include residential and commercial plumbing, drain cleaning, water heater services, and more, ensuring that your plumbing systems operate seamlessly.

whyChooseUs.mainPitch: Experience the superior standard of plumbing excellence with Vaughn's Superior Plumbing LLC.
sellingPoints: Fully licensed and insured professionals, ensuring your peace of mind and protection.
State-of-the-art equipment and techniques for efficient and effective service delivery.
Commitment to exceptional customer service, with prompt response times and clear communication.
